title: Completed PE Summary - Aalskere
raw_html:
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Harcus/Cumming
Port of registry: Kirkwall
Flag: UK
Type: Trawler
Built: 1997
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 33.89
Gross tonnage: 532.00
Date & Time 02/02/04 17:56
Location of incident: high seas
Incident Type: Accident to person
Injuries/ fatalities: 1 injured crew
Damage/ Pollution: None

Synopsis

Deckhand fell down open fishroom hatch when transferring empty bins from upper deck to fishroom.

Action taken:

A Chief Inspector's letter was sent to the owner/skipper of the vessel highlighting the need to carry out a full assessment of the risks for any unusual or non routine operation carried out on board, such as transferring fish stowage bins from one deck to another.
